telemetry.title: Telemetry
telemetry.subtitle: Intelligent sensor monitoring for precision agriculture
telemetry.description: We are developing a complete telemetry system that will allow you to monitor in real-time all sensors in your agricultural operation.
telemetry.features: Main features that will include: real-time monitoring, data analysis, intelligent alerts, automatic reports and advanced visualization.
telemetry.realTimeDataDesc: Continuous monitoring of temperature, humidity, pH and other critical parameters of your crops.
telemetry.analyticsDesc: Predictive analysis and detailed statistics to optimize your crop performance.
telemetry.reportsDesc: Automatic generation of reports and personalized alerts according to your needs.
